title: MARVEL APARTMENTS
welcome_page2: An impressive view of the Nemunas and Neris conflusion awaits you
space_text: The apartments have a lot of space, more than 150 sq. If necessary, 2-10 guests can stay. A large living room with dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, 5 sleeping areas, 3 bathrooms, a study and 2 large terraces await you. The terrace offers a beautiful view of the confluence of the Neris and Nemunas rivers, comfortable outdoor furniture and sunbeds. Private/enclosed yard, 3 parking spaces. Ideal for business travelers with large families, sports teams and groups of friends.
comfort_text: The apartments are fully furnished, equipped with the latest appliances with innovative features, comfortable large beds, a working kitchen and a laundry area. Guests can use all the necessary modern, innovative amenities and feel at home.
convenience_text: Apartments in the center of Kaunas city. Old town of Kaunas 1 km (15 min walk), Laisves al. - 2 km (30 min walk), Zalgiris Arena, Zalgiris swimming pool - 2 km, Lampedziai beach - 6 km, Kaunas airport - 17 km (20 min by car), bicycle tracks.
privacy_text: You can enjoy a high level of privacy in the serviced apartments. Confidentiality is ensured.
smoking_2: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the apartments
parties_2: It is forbidden to organize parties
guests_2: The number of guests specified in the reservation is accepted
guests_3: It is forbidden to invite outsiders without prior agreement
fine_2: If the specified rules are not followed, the tenant shall pay a fine of 200€
homebook_1: Our goal is to make you feel at home in the Marvel Apartments.
homebook_2: We have prepared a home guide for you, with the help of which you will be able to familiarize yourself with and easily use the installed devices and their functions.
speakersmirror_pdf: Smart LED Bathroom mirror with socket & Speakers
